TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RSA extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class RSA Inherits AsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: Represents the base class from which all implementations of the algorithm inherit.

span.span: Represents the base class from which all implementations of the algorithm inherit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要实现扩展此类证明`RSA`密钥。Extending this class proves that you are implementing an `RSA` key. 这是必需的任何开发人员提供新`RSA`重要的实施。This is required for any developer providing a new `RSA` key implementation. 此类的唯一用途是作为层次结构成员的标识的`RSA`算法。The only purpose of this class is as a hierarchy member for identification of the `RSA` algorithm. 如果安装了 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider，则 支持长度为 384 位至 16384 位（增量为 8 位）的密钥。The supports key lengths from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed. 如果安装了 Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider，则它支持长度为 384 位至 512 位（增量为 8 位）的密钥。It supports key lengths from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed.

summary.span: Initializes an object from the key information from an XML string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化 RSA 对象使用生成的 XML 字符串中使用密钥信息方法。The initializes an RSA object using key information in an XML string that was generated using the method. 方法接受 XML 字符串，包含一个公钥或 XML 字符串，包含公钥和私钥的密钥。The method accepts either an XML string containing a public key or an XML string containing a public and private key. 使用方法以方便地初始化密钥信息。Use the method to conveniently initialize key information. > [!CAUTION] > 保存 XML 字符串，包含私钥不安全的地方是一种安全威胁。Persisting an XML string containing a private key to an insecure location is a security threat. 如果恶意的第三方可以访问你的私匙，可能会泄漏您的应用程序的安全性。The security of your application can be compromised if a malicious third party can access your private key. 若要安全地保留私钥，使用安全的密钥容器。To safely persist a private key, use a secure key container. 有关密钥容器中持久保存私有密钥的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在密钥容器中存储非对称密钥](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。For more information about persisting private keys in a key container, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md).

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: The format of the parameter is not valid.

span.span: The format of the parameter is not valid.

param.span: to include a public and private RSA key; to include only the public key.

summary.span: Creates and returns an XML string containing the key of the current object.

span.span: Creates and returns an XML string containing the key of the current object.

returns.span: An XML string containing the key of the current object.

span.span: An XML string containing the key of the current object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法创建包含一个 XML 字符串的当前的公共和私有密钥对象或包含仅将公钥当前对象。The method creates an XML string that contains either the public and private key of the current object or contains only the public key of the current object. 使用无论何时需要方便地保存 RSA 密钥信息的方法。Use the method whenever you need to conveniently persist RSA key information. 若要初始化具有一个 XML 字符串，使用键对象方法。To initialize an object with the key in an XML string, use the method. > [!CAUTION] > 保存 XML 字符串，包含私钥不安全的地方是一种安全威胁。Persisting an XML string containing a private key to an insecure location is a security threat. 如果恶意的第三方可以访问你的私匙，可能会泄漏您的应用程序的安全性。The security of your application can be compromised if a malicious third party can access your private key. 若要安全地保留私钥，使用安全的密钥容器。To safely persist a private key, use a secure key container. 有关密钥容器中持久保存私有密钥的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在密钥容器中存储非对称密钥](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。For more information about persisting private keys in a key container, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md). 当传递`true`到方法，生成的 XML 字符串采用以下形式：When you pass `true` to the method, the resulting XML string takes the following form: ``` … …

…

… … … … … ``` 当传递`false`到方法，生成的 XML 字符串采用以下形式：When you pass `false` to the method, the resulting XML string takes the following form: ``` … … ```
